name: Easy Bruschetta Pasta
description: This is a simple, no-cook pasta sauce. Fresh tomatoes are the star here, so be sure you’re using ripe, juicy ones. This recipe is uber flexible—make it with any kind of tomato, such as plum, grape, cherry, or funky-shaped heirloom ones. You should have 3 cups chopped of whatever you choose.

ingredients.name: Italian Seasoning or Marinara Sauce Mix

preparation: In a large pot or Multipurpose Steamer, cook pasta according to directions. Drain.
Meanwhile, chop tomatoes. Remove cores, if desired.
Add tomatoes, vinegar, oil, and seasoning to pot; toss with pasta. Stir in cheese. Add toppings, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein.
